client.models.company 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : company.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/2/25 09:03
@Description : 企业相关的model
"""
from django.contrib.postgres.fields import ArrayField, JSONField
from django.db import models

from client.models.base import BaseModel, NameAndDescNameModel



[文档]class Province(models.Model):
    code = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="省份编码"
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="省份名称"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "province"
        verbose_name = "省份表"




[文档]class City(models.Model):
    province = models.ForeignKey(
        Province,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="省"
    )
    code = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="市编码"
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="市名称"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "city"
        verbose_name = "市"




[文档]class County(models.Model):
    city = models.ForeignKey(
        City,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="市"
    )
    code = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="区编码"
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="区名称"
    )

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name

    class Meta:
        db_table = "county"
        verbose_name = "县/区"




[文档]class CompanyType(NameAndDescNameModel):

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name

    class Meta:
        db_table = "company_type"
        verbose_name = "企业类型"




[文档]class Company(BaseModel):

    company_type = models.ForeignKey(
        CompanyType,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
    )
    s1_user_id = models.IntegerField(
        verbose_name="创建该企业用户ID"
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=100,
        verbose_name="企业名称"
    )
    credit_code = models.CharField(
        max_length=30,
        unique=True,
        verbose_name="社会统一信用代码"
    )
    county = models.ForeignKey(
        County,
        null=True,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="所属县/区"
    )
    management_detail_address = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        null=True,
        verbose_name="经营详细地址"
    )
    establish_at = models.DateField(
        verbose_name="成立时间",
        null=True
    )
    registered_capital = models.FloatField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="注册资本:元 "
    )
    paid_in_capital = models.FloatField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="实缴资本:元"
    )
    desc = models.TextField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="企业介绍"
    )
    management_range = models.TextField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="经营范围"
    )

    logo_url = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        null=True,
        verbose_name="企业logo"
    )
    business_license_url = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        null=True,
        verbose_name="营业执照URL"
    )
    registered_address = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        null=True,
        verbose_name="注册地址"
    )
    uid = models.CharField(
        default="",
        max_length=100,
        unique=True,
        db_index=True,
        verbose_name="企业short UUID"
    )
    bank_account_number = models.CharField(
        max_length=50,
        default="",
        verbose_name="对公银行账号"
    )
    bank_name = models.CharField(
        max_length=40,
        default="",
        verbose_name="对公银行名称"
    )
    bank_open_sub_branch = models.CharField(
        max_length=40,
        default="",
        verbose_name="对公开户支行"
    )
    bank_city = models.ForeignKey(
        City,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        null=True,
        related_name="company_bank_cities",
        verbose_name="开户行所在市"
    )
    legal_person_id_card = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        default="",
        verbose_name="法人身份证号"
    )
    legal_person_name = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        default="",
        verbose_name="法人姓名"
    )

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name

    class Meta:
        db_table = "company"
        verbose_name = "企业表"




[文档]class CompanyFile(BaseModel):
    """企业相关资质图片文件表"""
    legal_person_positive_url = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        verbose_name="法人正面身份证"
    )
    legal_person_unpositive_url = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        verbose_name="法人反面身份证"
    )
    legal_person_certificate = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="法人代表证明书"
    )
    authorized_by_operator = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="经办人授权文件"
    )
    special_industries_license = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="特殊行业经营许可"
    )
    env_protection_approval = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="环保批文"
    )
    audit_report = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="近3年审计报告"
    )
    financial_statements = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="近一年财务报表"
    )
    constitution = ArrayField(
        JSONField(
            verbose_name='{"file_name": "文件原始名", "url": "文件网址"}'
        ),
        null=True,
        verbose_name="公司章程"
    )
    company = models.OneToOneField(
        Company,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "company_file"
        verbose_name = "企业相关资质图片文件"




[文档]class CompanyReviewLog(BaseModel):
    """在用户创建企业 上传附件后创建该模型数据，默认状态是undo"""
    status_choices = (
        ("undo", "未审核"),
        ("pass", "审核通过"),
        ("reject", "审核拒绝"),
        ("apply_pay", "待申请打款"),
        ("un_pay", "待打款验证"),
        ("pay_fail", "打款验证失败"),
        ("un_upload", "未上传附件")
    )
    company = models.OneToOneField(
        Company,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="企业"
    )
    status = models.CharField(
        max_length=20,
        choices=status_choices,
        default="undo",
        verbose_name="审核状态"
    )
    s1_user_id = models.IntegerField(
        verbose_name="用户ID",
        null=True
    )
    reviewed_at = models.DateTimeField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="审核时间"
    )
    opinion = models.TextField(
        default="",
        verbose_name="审核意见"
    )
    snapshot = JSONField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="审批快照"
    )
    payment = models.BigIntegerField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="打款金额(单位: 分)"
    )
    payment_at = models.DateTimeField(
        null=True,
        verbose_name="填写打款时间"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "company_review_log"
        verbose_name = "企业认证审核表"




[文档]class CompanySupplyChain(BaseModel):
    company = models.ForeignKey(
        Company,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="本公司公司ID",
        related_name="company_supply_chains"
    )
    s1_user_id = models.IntegerField(
        verbose_name="创建人ID"
    )
    is_deleted = models.BooleanField(
        verbose_name="是否已经删除",
        default=False
    )
    chain_company = models.ForeignKey(
        Company,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="供应链公司ID",
        related_name="chain_company_supply_chains"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "company_supply_chain"
        verbose_name = "公司的供应链企业表"




[文档]class S1UserCompanyMap(BaseModel):
    company = models.ForeignKey(
        Company,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="关联的公司"
    )
    s1_user_id = models.IntegerField(
        verbose_name="用户ID"
    )
    is_deleted = models.BooleanField(
        default=False,
        verbose_name="是否已经禁用删除"
    )

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.s1_user_id}关联:{self.company.name},状态:{self.is_deleted}"

    class Meta:
        db_table = "s1_user_company_map"
        verbose_name = "用户与企业关联表"
